code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import Navbar from'../components/navbar/Navbar';import Foter from'../components/footer/Foter';import'./Cocktails.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cocktails=()=>{const[cocktails,setCocktails]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const url=`https://cocktails.solvro.pl/api/v1/cocktails?perPage=133`;fetch(url).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{if(Array.isArray(data.data)){setCocktails(data.data);}else{console.error('API response is not an array:',data);}}).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching data:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cocktails-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Check out our full ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Cocktail List"})]}),cocktails.map(cocktail=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/item/${cocktail.id}`,className:"cocktail-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cocktail-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:cocktail.imageUrl,alt:cocktail.name,className:"cocktail-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cocktail-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:cocktail.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:cocktail.instructions})]})]})},cocktail.id))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Foter,{})]});};export default Cocktails;
